skills.name: HANGED MAN
desc: • Deal 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to grant Reflect Shield to each ally for 1 turn.

skills.name: BLOODY THOUGHTS
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to all enemies.
• Deal Additional True Damage for every offensive beneficial effect on each enemy.
• Heal Block all enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: CAPTIVE
desc: Steal one beneficial effect from a random enemy at the start of battle, including Golden Effects.
